MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Weld Blundell Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:15PM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed there is a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Due to the repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 11PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:32PM on 21st March 2021
